seo.title: Development Services - AI-Powered SaaS, LLM Applications & ML Systems
seo.description: Professional development services including AI-powered SaaS platforms, LLM applications with RAG pipelines, AI agent systems, ML risk detection, web applications, and algorithmic trading systems. Custom AI and full-stack development with modern technologies.
seo.keywords: AI development services, LLM application development, RAG pipeline development, AI agent systems, ML risk detection, web application development, algorithmic trading systems, AI SaaS platform, prompt engineering, custom AI solutions, full stack AI developer

heading: My services
subtitle: I specialize in bridging AI/ML capabilities with real-world products. From LLM-powered SaaS platforms to ML-driven risk detection systems, I deliver production-grade AI solutions that drive business growth.

aiSaas.title: AI-Powered SaaS Platforms
aiSaas.description: Full-stack SaaS platforms with LLM integration, dynamic content generation, intelligent recommendation engines, and automated business workflows powered by AI.

aiAgents.title: AI Agent Systems
aiAgents.description: Autonomous AI agents with tool/function calling, structured outputs, and machine-to-machine protocols for payment processing, automation, and business intelligence.

llmApps.title: LLM Applications & RAG
llmApps.description: Production RAG pipelines with LangChain/LangGraph, vector databases, chatbots, document processing, and domain-specific retrieval-augmented generation systems.

riskDetection.title: ML Risk Detection & Fraud Prevention
riskDetection.description: Real-time risk scoring engines, anomaly detection pipelines, behavioral analysis, and automated fraud prevention systems using scikit-learn and feature engineering.

webApps.title: Web Applications
webApps.description: Modern full-stack web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and Python backends with real-time features, data visualization, and scalable architecture.

tradingSystems.title: Algorithmic Trading Systems
tradingSystems.description: Automated trading platforms with reinforcement learning (PPO, SAC), real-time data pipelines, technical indicators, and portfolio management dashboards.
